website_summaries.verdict: A soothing body lotion moisturizes without leaving your skin greasy.
pros: A little goes a long way
Rich lotion that doesn't feel heavy on your skin
cons: Some have said it doesn't smell like eucalyptus

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad-different
customer_reviews.text: I have used Thymes for years (emphasis!), specifically the Eucalyptus line, and even more specifically, the Eucalyptus body lotion. This latest bottle I bought smells different than all the other bottles I have used. There's not much of the Eucalyptus fragrance and the lingering smell is not that pleasant, super musky. I am thinking that this may be a fake bottle. The only difference I can see from my previous bottle (I still have the bottle) and the new one is that the leaves print on the new bottle is darker in color. I hope someone can get back to me about this. I may have to start shopping at Thymes website directly, rather than buying it here. Really upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: LAY H.

customer_reviews.title: Luscious!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so luscious. It smells clean and refreshing, isn't greasy and leaves your skin feeling like silk! I will buy it again and again even though it is a bit pricey. I, like another customer suggested, "cut" it slightly with an odorless and less expensive moisturizer. I have bought it for my sis-in-law and she says everyone asks what the delightful fragrance is that she is wearing ; )
customer_reviews.author: LilyMom

customer_reviews.title: Smells like Scrubbing Bubbles cleaning supplies
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife for mother's day, and we recognized the smell as soon as we opened it. It smells exactly like Scrubbing Bubbles cleaning supplies. I'd guess nobody could distinguish between the smells. So while the packaging is very nice and the moisturization seems fine, the scent will make you smell like a clean bathroom. I originally gave this 3 stars, but later changed to 1 star because the smell won't go away, hours after applying it and trying to wash it off.
customer_reviews.author: David Moerlein

customer_reviews.title: Best Lotion Out There!
customer_reviews.text: IMHO, this is the best body lotion out there! Love the fresh fragrence and the moisturizing properties. I have used this lotion for over 20 years and will continue to use it 20 years more.
customer_reviews.author: Centavo

customer_reviews.title: Powerful smell
customer_reviews.text: The smell is horribly strong. Was hoping the lemon/lemongrass would come through, but it's just an overwhelming, unpleasant scent that makes my nose run. Also, the lotion is much thinner than Thymes I used before. If Thymes sees this: Where can I find your Sleep Well Body Lotion? It was fragrance-free and thick (very effective moisturizer).
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal product!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best body lotions that I have ever used. It is non-greasy. And within seconds, softens the skin that is even the driest. I promise you that if you use this, you will not use any other brand regardless of the cost of its competitors.
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: Soft, pleasant aroma
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have ordered this product from Amazon because the price is right and, of course, the convenience. I love the eucalyptus smell, and this is perfect. It's not heavy so you don't overwhelm a room when you enter. I also have asthma so I cannot tolerate strong aromas; this body lotion does not affect my asthma.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Roye

customer_reviews.title: Lovely scented lotion
customer_reviews.text: My favorite lotion. Light yet soothing. The scent is clean and fresh but not overpowering. I regularly get complimented when wearing this.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca R

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent. I use it at night before I go to bed. People are very sensitive to smells so I don’t use use when I go out. Maybe I should to get a true reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and smooth
customer_reviews.text: It’s pricey but I even get comments on the nice smell at the gym. It’s not that heavy sweet smell that so many brands sell. It doesn’t leave a residue on the skin but makes your skin less dry.
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Viktoria

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion. Smells great
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite lotion. Smells so clean and the scent lasts. Strong scent but more of a soap smell and not an overpowering perfume smell
customer_reviews.author: ashleedawn82

customer_reviews.title: Smells heavenly
customer_reviews.text: I had this in one of my Cosmetic Box Subscriptions and have been hooked ever since. The smell is just amazing. Now my daughter buys it too.
customer_reviews.author: ffm61

customer_reviews.title: Love THYMES lotions
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I cut it 50/50 with a favorite unscented lotion to soften the scent. It is pretty robust. But love it and buy it often.
customer_reviews.author: DRW

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product
customer_reviews.text: I have MISSED this. I haven't had it in years and was totally THRILLED to find it again. I ordered the lotion, body wash and the perfume. I LOVE IT!! Totally recommend to anyone wanting a cool, clean fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Minnesota Based Company... Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Minnesota company and all of their fragrances and products. A small amount goes a long way. I have been using this for years.
customer_reviews.author: Yoga4life

customer_reviews.title: Last all day
customer_reviews.text: This is my summer go to. Such a clean fresh smell.
customer_reviews.author: Sandyt

customer_reviews.title: Fresh scent!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lotion for my hubby to replace a lotion that has been discontinued. We both love the scent. It does not have a strong overwhelming eucalyptus scent, which is not a problem for me or my hubby. I would describe the smell as a fresh clean fragrance with a hint of eucalyptus. I will purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: There was not seal
customer_reviews.text: Usual the box comes sealed in clear wrap,it had no seal box was open no seal on lotion anyone could just open the cap. Questionable , anyone can tamper with items not sealed
customer_reviews.author: Carherine

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing & Hydrating
customer_reviews.text: I love the refreshing smell of this nourishing lotion. The scent is not overwhelming and it leaves my skin very soft. It also feels refreshing on the feet and legs too. Highly recommend. Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Maurio-Gallucci

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Found this fragrance at The Abiquiu Inn in Abiquiu, New Mexico and have looked for it since then.
customer_reviews.author: Hippie chick

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Nice gel and lotion. Scent is not overpowering but lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Love Thymes!
customer_reviews.text: I looked all over for this lotion to no avail, until I thought to check Amazon. I am so happy that Amazom carries this product line and that I could use Amazon Prime for this purchase as well. The lotion smells awesome, it's just the right kind of thickness for this dry weather...and I was pleasantly surprised to see that the quantity for this product was the same size as the one I purchased several years ago. It felt like a bargain in this day and age of the ever shrinking product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cabiness

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lotion ever.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion. The fragrance is so fresh smelling.
customer_reviews.author: Alice ENNIS

customer_reviews.title: thumbs down unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I just can't get past how much this smells like the all purpose cleaner I use. I smell more lemon than eucalyptus unfortunately and it's like I rubbed cleaner all over me. Total bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca G

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing Eucalyptus
customer_reviews.text: Nice creamy and very moisturizing. Have had this many times over the years. Not greasy and absorbs quickly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Debs

customer_reviews.title: Amazing body cream!
customer_reviews.text: I found this body cream in a boutique, and absolutely fell in love with it. I just tried it on, and had to go back to the store the next day. I bought five bottles of it! I disagree with other reviewers that it is a bit manly; I receive compliments on it all the time! The cream is thick and keeps the skin moist as well. Yes, a little pricey, but well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jane E. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I buy more every time I run out. Love the scent and it does a good job moisturizing your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Barr

customer_reviews.title: I guess these products are now sold like commodities - whatever price the market will bear
customer_reviews.text: The price of this product has sky-rocketed during the last year. Last time I checked it was $25. I guess these products are now sold like commodities - whatever price the market will bear.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell!!
customer_reviews.text: I was at my nieces house last week and she had some on hand. I loved it, so I HAD to order some for myself! The smell is so fresh and clean!
customer_reviews.author: lovetoread

customer_reviews.title: but the fragrance is the perfect way to start my day
customer_reviews.text: It's one of the cleanest fragrances I've ever encountered and, for that, I've been a devoted customer since I first saw it in 1996. The lotion is protective of the skin, and silky enough to not leave a strong residue. For me, the lotion almost becomes a part of my skin. I don't use a lot of it, but the fragrance is the perfect way to start my day.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and give it as gifts also. Everyone loves the clean fragrance!
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Lotion is beautiful smelling and not greasy.
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about it. I use it all the time for hand and body lotion.
customer_reviews.author: lynda

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: It absorbs well and I like the fresh smell of Eucalyptus.Not too strong
customer_reviews.author: My Thoughts

customer_reviews.title: My favorite for many years
customer_reviews.text: My favorite for many years. Clean, refreshing and wonderful for the scent and the emollients in the creams are excellent. I have stockpiled a little bit just in case the production line shuts down....... I certainly hope not!!
customer_reviews.author: JMMinks

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Everywhere I go
customer_reviews.text: I have used this item since 2005 when a sample was left at a 5 star hotel in Vancouver. I love it! Everywhere I go, I get compliments on this fragrance, and it not only is an excellent body lotion,but has an elegant lasting fragrance. This company in Mpls. MN, manufacturers the finest products, and guarantees everything that they sell. Only high end stores carry their products. Since the original stores (boutique) where I was purchasing this product and others of the Thymes products, have closed, I had to turn to online service. Shopping with Amazon makes my shopping easy.
customer_reviews.author: Elvina MacMillen

customer_reviews.title: Love the Scent!
customer_reviews.text: Love love the mild smell of this lotion. I’ve used it for years! Have had several compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this lotion!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion! It smells fabulous and makes your body feel healthy and a little tingly. Eucalyptus has an aroma that is very intoxicating and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine W. Visco

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is the best and the fastest for me to receive orders.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product and it is not sold where I live. Thanks for taking care of your customers!
customer_reviews.author: Julie L. Shields

customer_reviews.title: Thymes Lotion Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion, I was on vacation and found this in Montana just outside Yellowstone National Park. Of, course it was very expensive but I bought it anyway. When I got back from my trip I looked on Amazon and good old Amazon, there it was and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: L. Donohoe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite scent, always keep on hand, a real treat!
customer_reviews.author: Darleen

customer_reviews.title: Great! But a little expensive...
customer_reviews.text: Good Product, I love the smell and how it feels on my body but found it to be a little expensive then what I got out of it. Still very pleasant smelling and great lotion. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Austin B.

customer_reviews.title: Unforgettable!
customer_reviews.text: I received this lotion along with other items in a kit for Christmas and loved the fragrance! I still do and have become a devotee of this product.
customer_reviews.author: DCMadam

customer_reviews.title: Lotion
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for years and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: LaVerne Guines

customer_reviews.title: great, slightly cooling body lotion
customer_reviews.text: this lotion has a slight cooling sensation which has a soothing, calming effect - it can be slightly thinned by using slightly damp hands to apply - spreads more easily and lasts longer that way
customer_reviews.author: GF here

customer_reviews.title: Great Scent- earthy, not sweet
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful, but pricy. My sister-in-law introduced me to it.
customer_reviews.author: Lagoniko

customer_reviews.title: Subtle, not sickenly sweet
customer_reviews.text: Delicious smell, subtle, not overwhelming, not sweet. Works well for me, would purchase again. Lotion not too heavy, not too watery, perfect consistency. If you like fragrances more to the woodsy side and subtle, this is the one for you. Love the Thymes brand
customer_reviews.author: Karlin

customer_reviews.title: Aromatherapy at its best
customer_reviews.text: I am a great fan of Thymes products. Am so happy to find them on Amazon! This lotion is shear luxury and the lovely, herbal scent is just DIVINE!!! Give it a try; you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Walden

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent!
customer_reviews.text: Have used the Thymes Eucalyptus products for years. Love the refreshing scent. Get compliments on the scent all the time after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachett

customer_reviews.title: Powdery smell
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Very powdery smell, I don’t smell eucalyptus at all. Actually can not tolerate the fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Thymes products
customer_reviews.text: LOVE Thymes products, especially Eucalyptus. The scent of Eucalyptus is fresh and clean and I always get compliments on it. Most importantly for me is that my skin appearance has improved. My arms are softer and not as red as they once appeared. Most definately recommmend even though its expensive, very worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells wonderful and fresh. The lotion has just the right texture. This is my second order.
customer_reviews.author: Pat T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: there's nothing like this cream, smells soooooo good, i use it everyday.. it's delicious.....
customer_reviews.author: Molly S.

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this lotion. I'm never at a ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this lotion. I'm never at a loss for stocking stuffers at Christmas or here and there gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Smells heavenly
customer_reviews.text: I keep this at my desk for the smell of relaxation and calmness. While it's not thick enough to use all over the body during the winter, I love using it all over during the summer. I first got hooked onto this brand when I was at a SPA about 10 years ago. The quality is superb and this brand never disappoints.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Better than bug spray.
customer_reviews.text: I use for bug spray. See my other review of the cologne.
customer_reviews.author: Royt

customer_reviews.title: Thymes Eucalyptus body lotion
customer_reviews.text: I've not used this particular Thymes product. I bought it to be used as a gift. I'm sure, if it's anything like the Thymes Eucalyptus fragrance mist or the Thymes Eucalyptus candle, it will be just wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Pat B

customer_reviews.title: I Love this Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: The Thymes Eucalyptus is one of the nicest fragrances I have found in a body lotion. It's subtle aroma stays with you for hours. I just wish I could find more products such as bath gel, shampoo, etc.
customer_reviews.author: KatieDid

customer_reviews.title: So glad I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: Scent is heavenly. I always receive compliments when I use it. Softens skin beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: helen choate

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love IT
customer_reviews.text: This lotion smells so good. I prefer to use it on my arms and hands only - using shea butter as body moisturizer....
customer_reviews.author: KRISTINA L RUFF

customer_reviews.title: The fragance is awesome for eucalyptus lovers
customer_reviews.text: The perfect product to use ( combined with the cologne) for occasions when a parfum is maybe too much to wear but you need to feel a fragance.
customer_reviews.author: Grisel Del Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells very faint; nowhere near the scent of the body wash.
customer_reviews.author: Lilli W

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product use it with Thymes body wash. Always a lovely scent Arrived in two days. Packaging was very good
customer_reviews.author: gym rat 70

customer_reviews.title: Thymes Body Lotion Eucalylptus
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for over 15 years. It smells so clean and fresh. I am going to purchase another bottle of the lotion and the body spray. It's that good!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Grossi

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell of this lotionand soap. Most men do not like it. smells last a good while thru-out the day.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Walker

customer_reviews.title: very little smell
customer_reviews.text: It has very little smell. Also what little smell it has in it doesn't last. I wouldn't recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: David Lentz

customer_reviews.title: Smells Good and Works Good!
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering this product for over a yeat now and have not been able to find a better body lotion. Very moisturizing and it smells wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: and the best part is the scent stays on your skin for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the nicest smelling lotion I've ever used, and the best part is the scent stays on your skin for pretty much the whole day. It has a really good feel too, not greasy at all. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: C Bedell

customer_reviews.title: Love my Thymes lotion!
customer_reviews.text: My lotion arrived promptly, new condition, in the box. I was well pleased .
customer_reviews.author: Judy Richeson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My all time favorite body lotion. Been using it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Jade

customer_reviews.title: ... is no lotion in this world that smells as good.
customer_reviews.text: There is no lotion in this world that smells as good.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Bobbe

customer_reviews.title: Great price, fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great price, fast delivery! I love this stuff and it's WAY more expensive everywhere else. Thank you for making it a pleasant experience.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for years. It keeps my skin soft and I love the smell! I also recommend any other Thymes products.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Love It !
customer_reviews.text: I honestly love the smell, its like a light fresh scent which lasts all day on my body :) I just wish it would be sold in a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Nataly

customer_reviews.title: Love this Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This body lotion is one of the best that I have tried. It has a wonderful, fresh fragrance and leaves your skin very soft. A great product, and I highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Parker

customer_reviews.title: Really like it
customer_reviews.text: It smells so fresh and smooths the skin. Very nice lotion. I use it after the body wash to keep the great smell longer.
customer_reviews.author: Timea73

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This the best lotion when you where it the feel and smell make you smile
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thymes Boby Lotion ,
customer_reviews.text: It's my very favorite one. I always wear it . People always ask what I'm wearing. Of course i tell them it's Thymes Boby lotion Eucalyptus
customer_reviews.author: rosella hollis

customer_reviews.title: Love the texture and aroma but
customer_reviews.text: Love the texture and aroma but wish it would smell more of eucalyptus which is why I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Norma C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the smell; not real thick so soaks in skin well
customer_reviews.author: brenda baker

customer_reviews.title: You'll love it and so will everyone around you
customer_reviews.text: I have several very nice fragrances I wear. Depending on the time of year and on the occasion, I wear Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue, Estee Lauder Beautiful, or Egyptian Musk Oil. I'll receive a compliment once-and-a-while, but nothing like when I use Thymes eucalyptus lotion. I can apply it after my shower at night, and the next day, co-workers and even strangers in the grocery will comment on how fabulous I smell. Best of all, it's the ONLY "fragrance" that generates compliments from my husband. A little bit goes a LONG way though. Definitely worth the cost. Try it - you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BellaSouth

customer_reviews.title: Love this lotion!
customer_reviews.text: I've loved & bought this lotion for about 20 years now. I first found it on a trip we took to Victoria, B.C. The smell is light & so fresh & it's super moisturizing. I'll be buying this for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Diane McCrady

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Lotion and cologne
customer_reviews.text: My favorite scent of all time. This luxurious lotion is great alone, or for layering with the Eucalyptus cologne. This is my signature scent and is clean - not floral or spicy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Banks

customer_reviews.title: GOT TO TRY IT
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. I work with my hands for a living. They get really beat up daily. I am happy to have found Thymes Eucalyptus. My hand are better than ever.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Myers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Scent and Great Texture
customer_reviews.text: Just like its body wash, I adore this scent. The lotion is not watery at all, absorbs quickly, and leaves the skin soft without a greasy feel. The scent lasts longer on clothes so I like to wear it before bed so my pajamas and linens stay perfumed. If I could collect everything from this line in this scent I would, budget allowing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon-tron 3000

customer_reviews.title: It’s not a “fake” product
customer_reviews.text: Fragrance and moisturizer, love it ! I’ve been using this for years !
customer_reviews.author: R. Kline

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love the clean fresh smell and it lasts all day long too. If folks are ok with the price, then go a head and treat yourself. I'm not sure if I will purchase it again. I think the price is a little high for a 9oz lotion. I'm waiting for the cologne to arrive so once I start layering it, I might not have to use as much and it will go further.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: Ever sin I'm not a eucalyptus fan, but the clean fresh and just healthy scent has totally won me over. The moisturizing ability is amazing! I'm now looking at other products in the line. Love the soap, a nice, generous sized bar!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This scent is a more masculine one that is clean, complimentary, and lasting. Think woodsy, fresh, out of the shower, clean- not menthol. The other essences that are within this lotion have brought forth numerous compliments from men and women alike. I love the smell of this because it isn't as overpowering as cologne, but it is sensual from nature and has an attractive scent for day or night.
customer_reviews.author: DMC3369

customer_reviews.title: I love it because it really works I have very sry ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it because it really works I have very sry skin with patches of rough dry and this lotion seems to heal them. I love the mild fragrance and the bottle is very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Ruscillo

customer_reviews.title: Just like the body wash I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: Just like the body wash I have purchased, this product has a wonderful citrus and eucalyptus scent. It is never greasy and always rubs in smoothly and completely. It is the perfect complement to the body wash or as a stand alone product. The scent lasts for hours and makes Me feel refreshed. People always ask me what that wonderful smell is, and I tell them it's this lotion. Just like the body wash, a small amount goes a long way. This lotion lasts and is worth the price. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H.

customer_reviews.title: I like Bath and Body Works but this is so much ...
customer_reviews.text: One of my all time favorites. The scent is relaxing and the lotion is as high quality as the lotion prescribed by my Dermatologist. I like Bath and Body Works but this is so much better and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Itravel

customer_reviews.title: clean scent. . .
customer_reviews.text: love this eucalyptus and lavender scents. found it at high end speciality for a lot more $$$. can wear with other fragrances or alone. long lasting on my skin. my husband and I both use philosophy pure grace lotion. I like thymes much better for the scent and lasting power! so glad I found it here. please keep it.
customer_reviews.author: shoe fan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fragrance
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase and I also purchased the body wash. The scent may seem strong at first, almost medicinal but it lightens up into a very relaxing and beautiful fragrance. If it is still too strong, mix it with an unscented lotion, like Cetaphil and it will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Deb_Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I have always order the eucalyptus fragrances, but in ...
customer_reviews.text: I have always order the eucalyptus fragrances, but in this batch, the smell is very light compared to the other times I have order it. As if it was mixed with water or something else. This goes for the spray too. Painfully prices have gotten up too. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes F Encarnacion

customer_reviews.title: No eucalyptus scent
customer_reviews.text: I returned this immediately. There was no eucalyptus scent, only a mix of baby powder and something else that was very floral. I wanted to be able tolerate the scent, but just couldn't.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Korf

customer_reviews.title: ... earth to buy this stuff - not only smells great but repels
customer_reviews.text: Will go to the ends of the earth to buy this stuff - not only smells great but repels bugs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Rhymes lotion.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lotion. Unique scent. Love to apply after shower, no additional perfume needed. I receive lots of compliments. There are other scents. I am interested in the Sage but can't find.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lyles

customer_reviews.title: Love this lotion!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite scents from Thymes. Their lotions are wonderful - very rich, but not greasy.
customer_reviews.author: SCT

customer_reviews.title: smooth
customer_reviews.text: Wrote the wrong review for the hand wash. Thought it was the body lotion. It is a hard to find lotion. Don't know why because it is wonderful, goes on very smooth and soaks in very well. Love the fragrance. Stays with me for a while too.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Best Lotion Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best lotion ever. Have been using it for over twenty years. It helped calm and soothe an area of skin being treated with radiation for cancer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne V

product_meta.title: Thymes Body Lotion - 9.25 Fl Oz – Eucalyptus
feature_bullets: Hydrating Moisturizer: A fan-favorite renowned for its superior performance, our body lotion has been formulated by Thymes chemists to moisturize and condition without greasiness, absorbing beautifully into skin.
Artisan Design: Inspired by botanicals in art and nature, Thymes is passionate about creating products that have refreshing fragrances, high-quality ingredients, and beautiful presentation.
Fragrance Details: Eucalyptus - Invigorating eucalyptus oil. Crisp Italian lemon. Energizing petitgrain. Sweet bergamot. Lively lemongrass. Lush fir.
The Perfect Gift: With unique fragrances, artfully-designed packaging and botanically-based products, a gift from Thymes is sure to make your special someone smile.

Who We Are: Thymes carefully selects plant-based ingredients and naturally-derived botanical extracts that are rich in vitamins, beneficial nutrients, and vital antioxidants. Always cruelty-free and formulated without parabens and petrolatum.
